title: Are you supposed to build armor/health when you or your team is behind?
body: That's what people are telling me.

replies.body:
If you're weak, but your team is doing good then probably.

Other than that well tbh there's no blanket rule. Depends on how your champion grows compared to theirs and the matchups. If you have no threat and your team is behind that is bad unless you can straight stall.

But defensive items particularly hybrids are pretty good value in this game.

Only if you are an early game champion, i.e. Renketon or Pantheon, and you're past the early -game, or you can itemize it effectively. For example, if you're playing Syndra, picking up a Zhonya's to help deal with a fed Zed is a good idea. Buying a Randuin's is stupid, its just a waste on Syndra. In the case of an early game champ, its harder to snowball at a deficient, so you are more useful to your team just building tank.
